Vegan and its effects on breast cancer

Summary generated using: $shovel3 query.concatConclusions 'breast cancer vegan site:ncbi.nlm.nih.gov' 40 includeReference=True
  • The study suggests that non vegetarian diet is the important risk factor for Breast Cancer and the risk of Breast Cancer is more in educated women as compared with the illiterate women.
    • Journal:

  • Minority breast cancer survivors were recruited and retained in a weight loss study. Six months of the Curves program resulted in moderate weight loss, but weight loss was not maintained postintervention. Future interventions should identify methods to increase uptake and maintenance of weight loss behaviors. Copyright Â© 2013 The Obesity Society.
